references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, a foundational technology enabling efficient high-resolution image synthesis and is used as the base model in this study.

references.paper_title: Dreambooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation.
references.reason: This paper presents a method for personalizing text-to-image diffusion models, which is essential for the personalization task addressed in ZOODiP.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion.
references.reason: This paper introduces Textual Inversion, a key technique for personalization by optimizing new text tokens, which ZOODiP builds upon.

references.paper_title: Fine-tuning language models with just forward passes.
references.reason: This paper introduces the use of zeroth-order optimization, which is a core component of ZOODiP.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision.
references.reason: This paper presents CLIP, which is used as the primary metric for evaluating image and text alignment in the experiments.
